content:
Moonnaammaniyilumenneratthum
Vandikkunnu-jeeva sleebaaye
Nettiyilathine rooshshaa cheyyu-
Nnathuthaan nyangall-kkabhayam sangketham
Raavum pakalum dushdaneyum sainyattheyum
Paayichathu kaatthidunnu.

Vibhajichaazhiye sainyasamaksham
Vadiyaal mosha-gatharaayisraayel
Kartthaaveshu sleebaayaale
Shiyolluthura-nnaamrthareyetti
Kabarilninnum-parudeeserum
Jeevadamaam-vazhikaattiya mashihaa dhanyan

Sleebaayaale than sabhaye vindaanaam puthraa!
Shaino nalkitthal suthare nee rakshichaalum.

Maanavalokarkkathbhutha veeryam kaattiya sleebaa
Ennum melaalunnathamaakkum sabhathan mauli
Vandikkunnorkkullprabha nalkum sleebaa thante
Ullprabha kaanmaanennullkkankallkkekuka deepthi

Maargam thettippoyoru sabhaye rakshichone!
Neethiyezhum nin vidhiyathilenne rakshikkenam
Nin kurishettam kondaadaanaayu koodiya nyangall
Ninkrpamoolam nithyasmr്yathiyil sthuthi paadenam.

Daivathanoojaa! Valabhaagatthe moshdaavinmel
Nee krpa cheythu. Nyangademelum krpa cheyyenam.
